mapper.sql: select tp.paper_id, tp.paper_name, tp.paper_score, tp.start_time, tp.end_time, tp.minute, tp.creator_id, tp.create_time, tp.update_time, tp.status, tp.course_id, tc.course_name, tp.type, tp.is_random, tp.term_id, tt.term_name from t_paper tp left join t_course tc on (tp.course_id = tc.course_id) left join t_paper_dept tpd on (tp.paper_id = tpd.paper_id) left join t_term tt on tp.term_id = tt.term_id where 1 = 1
